<title level="1" right="Trait">[Conrasu](/Traits.aspx?ID=343)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 138 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

A people that are made of cosmic force given consciousness and housed within unique exoskeletons. Conrasus craft and use these weapons.
name: Conrasu
